text:
After updating my trunk copy and building a fresh webapplication I noticed that
the taboveriew usecase doesn't work anymore, whenever you klick an element in
the sitetree you get HTTP Status 404. 

This is because the link should be
http://localhost:8080/lenya/authoring/foo.html and currently is
http://localhost:8080/authoring/foo.html
creator: philippbaust@web.de

text: Ups, the error is in sitetree.jx...
